Week 4 Project

Starter Workspace with Analgous Colour Scheme

MENU

  • Typography
  • Lists

  • Forms

Typography

This guide uses 'Lato', a san-serif font, for headlines and links, and 'Vollkron', a serif font, for text. Both are available from google fonts.

Both ordered and unordered lists can be customizable with colours and styles of text. In addition, the unordered list icons are fully customizable. See item no. 5 on both lists for an example of a custom link within a list.
